Docs.summary: Bypasses the holding zone when submitting a file to the official file repository.

Content of the document being submitted.

Docs.summary: Submits a document (content and metadata) to a content organizer-enabled site.
Docs.returns: An OfficialFileResult enumeration indicating the result of the submission.

remarks.para: See also MS-OFFICIALFILE documentation on MSDN in SharePoint Products and Technologies Protocols for more information.
